channel.title: HL1 - no subtitles?
channel.description:
I've never played HL1 before and i was kinda surprised that the game has no subtitles.
English is not my main language and although i can understand almost everything, it would be nice to be sure if i understand all the dialogues correctly.
Is there a mod out there that adds subtitles to the game?
